colors.name: seafoam
colors.hint: This color name is something you'd walk through at the beach.

colors.name: magenta
colors.hint: The color is part of the acronym C M Y K.

colors.name: lavender
colors.hint: This purple is the name of a flower.

colors.name: aqua
colors.hint: This bright blue starts and ends with the same letter.

colors.name: purple
colors.hint: This color can be made from red and blue.

colors.name: lime
colors.hint: This color is a type of citrus.

colors.name: citrus
colors.hint: Oranges, limes, and lemons are a type of this.

colors.name: maroon
colors.hint: Ron Weasley always received this color sweater from Mrs. Weasley.

colors.name: peach
colors.hint: The color name is the state fruit of georgia.

colors.name: violet
colors.hint: This color is the purple part of a rainbow.

colors.name: scarlet
colors.hint: A gryffindor house color.

colors.name: bubblegum
colors.hint: A type of pink and also a type of candy.

colors.name: rose
colors.hint: A flower often given to a significant other.

colors.name: avocado
colors.hint: This color name is a type of fruit, often favored by Millennials.

colors.name: orange
colors.hint: This fruit is made into a popular juice.

colors.name: turquoise
colors.hint: This blue green is a stone often used in jewelry.

colors.name: gold
colors.hint: The color name is a type of metal.

colors.name: sky
colors.hint: This blue is where clouds are found.

colors.name: chartreuse
colors.hint: This green is also the name of a French liquor.

colors.name: slate
colors.hint: This grey is a type of rock.

colors.name: melon
colors.hint: A type of fruit, often cut into wedges.

colors.name: cherry
colors.hint: The color name is a red stone fruit.

colors.name: ultramarine
colors.hint: An ultra blue color.
